1.title: Part 1
1.plot: Part 1 of this epic tale of war, love, betrayal, and sabotage. When Andrey, Katya, and Linko crash land in the field of battle, they find themselves in a struggle for survival that test the bonds of friendship.

imdb.plot outline: The language is Russian and so is its origin-- unlike what's quoted here. The German language (sparse but appropriate) is VOd in a feminine Russian voice. Standard subtitles in English for both. Many subplots make for rich viewing here, and production quality is at-least equal to Hollywood. World viewers appreciate the storylines which depict ordinary people doing extraordinary things in wartime-- as life must go on. Here, in each choice made by characters on both sides, the overriding option for survival-- if possible-- questions the basic timbre of individuals in a seemingly impossible environment. Eight episodes of 50 min each are barely enough, and celebrate this as long-form film-making.
imdb.title: The Bomber
plot: In this award-winning action series a soviet aircraft crashes on Nazi-occupied territory.

The language is Russian and so is its origin-- unlike what's quoted here. The German language (sparse but appropriate) is VOd in a feminine Russian voice. Standard subtitles in English for both. Many subplots make for rich viewing here, and production quality is at-least equal to Hollywood. World viewers appreciate the storylines which depict ordinary people doing extraordinary things in wartime-- as life must go on. Here, in each choice made by characters on both sides, the overriding option for survival-- if possible-- questions the basic timbre of individuals in a seemingly impossible environment. Eight episodes of 50 min each are barely enough, and celebrate this as long-form film-making.::artmed

_The Bomber_ (qv) is a love story taking place within the larger confines of World War II on the eastern front. The bomber airplane in the series title merely serves as the vehicle to take three Soviet aircrew into German occupied Russian territory where it is shot down and the rest of the story unfolds. Once on the ground, the three interact with German troops, Russian guerillas, and Russian citizens as they try to stay alive and participate in the Russian war effort to thwart the German invasion of their mother Russia. Two of the aircrew are married and their attempts to find each other in the chaos of war is part of the story.::orcadan
